model_solution:
## Step 1: Write down the matrices
$\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 5 \\ -2 & 4 \end{pmatrix} + \begin{pmatrix} 0 & -3 \\ 8 & -5 \end{pmatrix}$
## Step 2: Add corresponding elements in the matrices
$\begin{pmatrix} 1+0 & 5+(-3) \\ (-2)+8 & 4+(-5) \end{pmatrix}$
## Step 3: Simplify the matrix
$\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 6 & -1 \end{pmatrix}$
## Step 1: The matrix is already simplified.


The final answer is: $\boxed{\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 6 & -1 \end{pmatrix}}$
